name: Academic Study
description: Focused on core school and college subjects such as Math, Science, Literature, and History.

name: Language Learning
description: Master new languages including English, Spanish, French, and more to enhance communication.

name: Freelancing
description: Learn how to start freelancing, build portfolios, win projects, and grow a remote career.

name: Skills and IT
description: Develop essential IT and digital skills to thrive in today's technology-driven world.

name: Design and Creative
description: Explore graphic design, video editing, animation, and other creative tools and techniques.

name: Career Readiness
description: Prepare for job markets with resume writing, interview skills, and soft skills training.

name: Digital Marketing
description: Master SEO, social media, content marketing, email campaigns, and paid advertising.

name: Web Development
description: Build responsive websites and web apps using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks.

name: Business and Entrepreneurship
description: Gain skills in business planning, startup launching, and managing small businesses.

name: Finance and Accounting
description: Learn personal finance, business accounting, and investment fundamentals.

name: Microsoft Office Tools
description: Get skilled in MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and productivity tools.

name: Video and Animation
description: Learn video editing, motion graphics, and 2D/3D animation using industry tools.

name: Soft Skills
description: Improve communication, time management, leadership, and team collaboration.

name: Health and Wellness
description: Courses on physical fitness, mental health, and overall well-being.

name: Public Speaking
description: Build confidence and clarity in public speaking and professional presentations.
